title: Coordinator, Digital Analytics and Projects - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Coordinator, Digital Analytics and Projects Sports Media Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: The Digital Analytics and Projects Coordinator will compile social media data from as many as 100 accounts, charting post frequency and engagement rates, into executive reports. This position will also manage content marketing and social media campaigns across multiple departments.
